Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Nohomba baparanga balia abali no bulwale mumioyo chiabu mbu Nyasaye shalira habulafu obusuku bwabu tawe
Ne khwenyanga khwakhakhwechesiye bo, ne wakhabamanyile khu ebimanyisio biabu, ne wakhabamanyile khukhulomaloma khwabu, Ne Nyasaye yamanya muno ebikhole bienyu
Ne toto khulabatema okhula khumanye abalwani khunjila ya Nyasaye mwinywe, nende abesumilisi ne khulabatema mumakhuwa kenyu
Toto balia bakhaya mana nibekalila injila ya Nyasaye, mana nibayingania Omurumwa, niyakhamala okhubahelesia obulunjifu, shibalikhola Nyasaye eshindu tawe, ne alikwisia ebikhole biabu
Enywe abasuubila muwulile Nyasaye nende Omurumwa ne mulanyasia ebikhole bienyu tawe
Toto balia bakhaya mana nibekalila injila ya Nyasaye mana nibafwa nibali abakhayi Nyasaye shalibaleshela tawe
Mana mulatendeya mwenya omulembe tawe ne enywe nenywe balashila, Ne Nyasaye ali ninanyu, ne shalabeema omurungo kwebikhole bienyu tawe
Toto obulamu bwokhushialo nomubayo nende okhukalilisia, ne ni musuubila mana mwaria Nyasaye alabahelesia omurungo kwenyu ne shalabareeba emiandu chienyu tawe
Ne nabareba , mana abatilile, muleemana, ne alarusia obusuku bwenyu habulafu

Enywe ano mulangungwa murusie khu injila ya Nyasaye, ne mwinywe balimwo bemananga, ne wimana yeyimanga omwene, Ne Nyasaye no muyinda nanyu muli abatakha, ne nimukhaya Nyasaye alarera Abandu bandi balali enywe, mana bakhaye okhuba shinga enywe
